member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account
member.summary: Configuration data for an Ad Exchange buyer account.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.BidderLocation
member.summary: Your bidder locations that have distinct URLs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.CookieMatchingNid
member.summary: The nid parameter value used in cookie match requests. Please contact your technical account manager if you need to change this.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.CookieMatchingUrl
member.summary: The base URL used in cookie match requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.Id
member.summary: Account id.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.MaximumTotalQps
member.summary: The sum of all bidderLocation.maximumQps values cannot exceed this. Please contact your technical account manager if you need to change this.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.BidderLocationData.MaximumQps
member.summary: The maximum queries per second the Ad Exchange will send.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.BidderLocationData.Region
member.summary: The geographical region the Ad Exchange should send requests from. Only used by some quota systems, but always setting the value is recommended. Allowed values: - ASIA - EUROPE - US_EAST - US_WEST

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Account.BidderLocationData.Url
member.summary: The URL to which the Ad Exchange will send bid requests.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.AccountsList
member.summary: An account feed lists Ad Exchange buyer accounts that the user has access to. Each entry in the feed corresponds to a single buyer account.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.AccountsList.Items
member.summary: A list of accounts.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.AccountsList.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative
member.summary: A creative and its classification data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.HTMLSnippet
member.summary: The HTML snippet that displays the ad when inserted in the web page. If set, videoURL should not be set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.AccountId
member.summary: Account id.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.AdvertiserId
member.summary: Detected advertiser id, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.AdvertiserName
member.summary: The name of the company being advertised in the creative.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.Attribute
member.summary: All attributes for the ads that may be shown from this snippet.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.BuyerCreativeId
member.summary: A buyer-specific id identifying the creative in this ad.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.ClickThroughUrl
member.summary: The set of destination urls for the snippet.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.DisapprovalReasons
member.summary: The reason for disapproval, if any. Note that not all disapproval reasons may be categorized, so it is possible for the creative to have a status of DISAPPROVED with an empty list for disapproval_reasons. In this case, please reach out to your TAM to help debug the issue. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.Height
member.summary: Ad height.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.ProductCategories
member.summary: Detected product categories, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.SensitiveCategories
member.summary: Detected sensitive categories, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.Status
member.summary: Creative serving status. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.VendorType
member.summary: All vendor types for the ads that may be shown from this snippet.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.VideoURL
member.summary: The url to fetch a video ad. If set, HTMLSnippet should not be set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.Creative.Width
member.summary: Ad width.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.CreativesList
member.summary: The creatives feed lists the active creatives for the Ad Exchange buyer accounts that the user has access to. Each entry in the feed corresponds to a single creative.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.CreativesList.Items
member.summary: A list of creatives.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.CreativesList.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.CreativesList.NextPageToken
member.summary: Continuation token used to page through creatives. To retrieve the next page of results, set the next request's "pageToken" value to this.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal
member.summary: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange direct deal.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.AccountId
member.summary: The account id of the buyer this deal is for.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.Advertiser
member.summary: The name of the advertiser this deal is for.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.CurrencyCode
member.summary: The currency code that applies to the fixed_cpm value. If not set then assumed to be USD.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.EndTime
member.summary: End time for when this deal stops being active. If not set then this deal is valid until manually disabled by the publisher. In seconds since the epoch.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.FixedCpm
member.summary: The fixed price for this direct deal. In cpm micros of currency according to currency_code.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.Id
member.summary: Deal id.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.SellerNetwork
member.summary: The name of the publisher offering this direct deal.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDeal.StartTime
member.summary: Start time for when this deal becomes active. If not set then this deal is active immediately upon creation. In seconds since the epoch.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDealsList
member.summary: A direct deals feed lists Direct Deals the Ad Exchange buyer account has access to. This includes direct deals set up for the buyer account as well as its merged stream seats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDealsList.DirectDeals
member.summary: A list of direct deals relevant for your account.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.Data.DirectDealsList.Kind
member.summary: Resource type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.AdexchangebuyerService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.AdexchangebuyerService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Adexchangebuyer.v1_1.AdexchangebuyerService.Scopes.AdexchangeBuyer
member.summary: Manage your Ad Exchange buyer account configuration
